channel.title: Posts on kKachu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on kKachu

item.title: A New Page
item.description: Raison d’Etre I’ve always had a looming feeling that I’m horrible at documenting things; which is weird. You’d think that someone with a perpetual narration going in her head would have no problem pouring her thoughts down to writing. This has manifested in an ugly way, three months into my new job. I am now knee deep in a long, strenuous analytics project with no doc in sight. And the cherry on top is?

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
